de.wingu.sdk

Class WinguSDKBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.wingu.sdk.WinguSDKBuilder

  • public abstract class WinguSDKBuilder
extends Object
    Builder for WinguSDK. Allows to configure, build and launch wingu SDK.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      private static boolean DEFAULT_GEOFENCE_FOREGROUND_SCAN 
      private static boolean DEFAULT_IBEACON_BACKGROUND_SCAN 
      private static boolean DEFAULT_IBEACON_FOREGROUND_SCAN

      abstract WinguSDK build()
      Builds and launches the sdk.
      WinguSDKBuilder geofenceBackgroundScan(boolean enabled)
      Configures if the app can scan for geofence channels in background mode.

                                   Application application,

        Creates a new builder.
        Parameters:

        New builder

      • geofenceBackgroundScan

        public WinguSDKBuilder geofenceBackgroundScan(boolean enabled)
        Configures if the app can scan for geofence channels in background mode. Default value is WinguSDKBuilder.DEFAULT_GEOFENCE_BACKGROUND_SCAN.

      • geofenceForegroundScan

        public WinguSDKBuilder geofenceForegroundScan(boolean enabled)
        Configures if the app can scan for geofence channels in foreground mode. Default value is WinguSDKBuilder.DEFAULT_GEOFENCE_FOREGROUND_SCAN.

      • iBeaconBackgroundScan

        public WinguSDKBuilder iBeaconBackgroundScan(boolean enabled)
        Configures if the app can scan for ibeacon channels in background mode. Default value is WinguSDKBuilder.DEFAULT_IBEACON_BACKGROUND_SCAN.

      • iBeaconForegroundScan

        public WinguSDKBuilder iBeaconForegroundScan(boolean enabled)
        Configures if the app can scan for ibeacon channels in foreground mode. Default value is WinguSDKBuilder.DEFAULT_IBEACON_FOREGROUND_SCAN.

      • registerComponent

        public WinguSDKBuilder registerComponent(ComponentSpec componentSpec)
        Registers an additional wingu component.

      • staging

        public WinguSDKBuilder staging(boolean isStaging)
        Forces to use staging server (for test purposes).

      • build

        public abstract WinguSDK build()
        Builds and launches the sdk.
